column1: The '''Dome of Stars''' was the great hall in the King's city of [[Osgiliath]]
column3: which was built on top of the great bridge across the [[Anduin]]

column1: The '''Tower of the Dome of Osgiliath''' was destroyed during the civil war of the [[Kin-strife]]<ref>{{App|Gondor}}</ref> in {{TA|1437}}.<ref>{{UT|Palantiri}}
